content.rendered:
Directed by T.J. Gnanavel

Written by T.J. Gnanavel. Rajendra Sapre

Star Suriya (Chandru). Lijo Mol Jose (Senggeni (as Lijomol Jose)). Manikandan K. (Rajakannu (as Manikandan)). Rajisha Vijayan (Maithra). Prakash Raj (I.G. Perumalsami (as Prakashraj)). Rao Ramesh (A.G. Ram Mokan). Guru Somasundaram (P.P. Cellapandian). M.S. Bhaskar (Sangaran). V. Jayaprakash (D.G.P. Radhakrishnan (as Jaya Prakash)).Sibi Thomas . Ilavarasu (Gunasekaran). Jayarao (Kathirvel). Sujatha Sivakumar (Subbulakshmi Kathirvel (as Sujatha)). Ravi Venkatraman (Inspector Baashyam). Tamizh (S.I. Gurumoorthy). Kumaravel (Inspector Albi Antony). Supergood Subramani (Veerasamy). Bala Hasan (Kirubakaran (as Balahasan)). Raja Rani Pandian (Rajan (as ‘Raja Rani’ Pandian)). Subatra Robert (Pachaiyammal (Rajakannu’s Sister) (as Supatra)). Rajendran (Mosakutty). Baby Joshika Maya (Alli). Bava Chelladurai (Krishnan (as Bava Selladurai)). Kaleeswaran (Kalyani (as Prof. Ir.Kaleeswaran)). Kumar Natarajan (Kolanji Case Judge). Sanjay Swaroop (Judge Constantine). Shankar Sundaram (Judge Satyadev). Anaangoor Raju (Rasakannu mama (as Anangur Raju)). M. Sinrasu (Iruttappan). S. Ravi (Ezhumalai). Deepa (Iruttappan’s Wife). Kaveri (Mosakutty’s Wife). Bigil Siva (Doctor Mahesh). Hello Kandasamy (Mundiyampakkam Vieo). K. Raj (Medical Shop Vinodh). Jijoi Pr (Munnar Rajesh (as Jijoi P.R)). Kalakkadu V. Ranganathan (Brick Kiln Owner). Supervisor Raju (Thasiltar (as Melalar Raju)). Srikanth (Rice Mill Owner). Kulothungan (Mortgage Shop Owner). Pathman (Ravi). Padmapriya (Gunasekaran’s Wife (as Padmapriya Sivaranjani)). Set Dhanasekhar (Tea Shop Owner). Anbaana Arun (B.S.N.L Supervisor). ‘Winner’ Ramachandran (Judge #1). Rukmani (Judge #2). Sivalingam Babu (Judge #3). Amarar Krav Maha Sriram (Law College Professor). Rajesh Balachandiran (Inspector Natrajan). David Soloman (Sasikumar pandiyan (as David)). Maheshwaran (Doctor Surendran). Dayaalan (Jailer). Jaishankar (Kolanji). Ravishankar (Forensic Manoharan). Aravind Sejju (Madhan). Brahadeeshwaran (Hand Broken Lawyer). Mayilai Manivannan (Judge Officer). Murugesan (Kathirvel’s Worker). Ramkumar Pazhani (Forensic Expert). Deva (Shankar). Subramani (Rangarain). Saravanan (Sekar). Sellavel (Sivalingam). Yuva (Arunachalam). Dhandapani (Ramasamy). Karthik (Kalidasan). Vetri Kiran (Government Officer). Chaplin Sundamir (Kadalur Jail Police). Jagir (Mufti Police 1). Sivajudasan (Mufti Police 2). Ashokan (Kaliappan). Ganeshan (Mundiyampakkam Inspector). Kamal (Law College Professor). Balaji (Lawyer 1). Parthasarathy (Lawyer 2). Sathish (Lawyer 3). Harikrishnan (Lawyer 4). Murugan (Lawyer 5). Ramasubramanyan (Lawyer 6). Thiagarajan (Lawyer 7)

Language Tamil. Hindi. Telugu

Producers Jyotika. Suriya

Production 2D Entertainment
